CustomField.description: This field tells you whether this Account is a candidate for the 2012 IntApp 600.
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Industry,"Legal")), "Outside Legal", IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Legal_Entity_Type__c, "Firm")), "Legal - Not a Firm", IF(AND(OR(ISBLANK(Lawyers__c), Lawyers__c <50), OR(ISBLANK(Timekeepers__c), Timekeepers__c < 50)), "Law Firm under both 50 Lawyers and 50 Timekeepers", IF(AND(OR(ISBLANK(Lawyers__c), Lawyers__c <100), OR(ISBLANK(Timekeepers__c), Timekeepers__c < 100)), "Law Firm under both 100 Lawyers and 100 Timekeepers", IF(AND(OR(ISBLANK(Lawyers__c),Lawyers__c < 100), Timekeepers__c >=100), "Law Firm under 100 Lawyers but over 100 Timekeepers", IF(OR(ISBLANK(Intapp_Master_Ranking__c), Intapp_Master_Ranking__c >300), "Law Firm over 100 Lawyers and 100 Timekeepers", "2009 IntApp 1-300"))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field tells you whether this Account is a candidate for the 2012 IntApp 600.
CustomField.label: Simple 300
